page.title: 04WILLIAM MORFOOT LTD.
page.content: This land drainage and plant hire firm has been based at{Shipdham {airfield}since 1949. They install drainage systems on farm land throughout Norfolk and Suffolk, using a new machine, a 'land drainer' which cost Â£75,000. It digs a trench and lays and grades the pipes automatically, then the trench is filled in by tractor. The charge is Â£250 an acre. They can drain 10 acres per day.{Morfoots}also hire out other machinery with a driver: a bulldozer, a tracked hydraulic shovel, and tracked hydraulic excavator.{W. {Morfoot Ltd.}has been based at the airfield since 1949. They are based in wartime buildings and have about 8 acres of space. They employ 20 people fewer now because of mechanisation.
